sub_title: Sr. Digital Product Manager Global - Sleep & BabyTech @ Philips
summary:
My ambition is to create a better and healthier world using meaningful innovations and user-centered design.

As Digital Product Manager with 10+ years digital experience, I'm able to create meaningful, customer-focused innovations and digital platforms by leading multidisciplinary teams around the globe. I'm specialized in healthtech, IoT and fintech innovations. I bring an idea from sketch to market; define a solid product vision, gather user feedback, analyze analytics data, and market the solution digitally. I make things happen, constantly improve (SaFe/Agile certified PO/PM) and manage solutions throughout the full product life cycle. I have multiple years of experience working remotely and leading teams located in the US, Europe and Asia. In my free time I enjoy travelling, sports and haute cuisine. Like to work hard, play hard.

Specialties and keywords: Product Manager, UX Design, Product Owner, Mobile App Development, Innovation, Design, Prototyping, R&D, Customer Journey, Service Design, user testing, market research, Persona's, creative sessions, Agile, Safe, product lead, leadership, entrepreneur, Scrum, Blockchain, HealthTech, FinTech, Disruptive, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Growth Hacking, eHealth, Public Speaker, Growth Hacker, MBA, digital platforms, SaaS, Amazon, AWS, Alexa, TUYA, PEGA, BPM tooling

awards.title: IF Design Award 2022 - Philips Avent Night Owl Connected baby/video monitor
awards.description:
The connected baby/video monitor allows parents to interact with their baby securely from anywhere at any time of the day. Designed to blend into young parents’ contemporary interior décors. The baby unit is iconic and fits modern baby rooms; the parent unit is mobile and compact and accommodates the parent’s lifestyle. The product is ecologically designed, which reflects the sustainability mindset of young parents and their awareness of “green parenting.

More info: https://ifdesign.com/en/winner-ranking/project/philips-avent-night-owl-connected-babyvideo-monitor/332383

awards.title: Red Dot Design Award 'best of the best' 2022 - Philips Avent Night Owl Connected Baby Monitor
awards.description:
The full-HD Philips Avent Connected Baby Monitor consists of a baby and a parent unit. The feed from the baby unit can also be viewed on a smartphone. The system allows parents to interact with their baby in a secure way from anywhere at any time of the day. The product is designed in line with Philips’ EcoDesign requirements aimed at improving energy efficiency, especially during the customer use phase, reflecting the sustainability mindset and awareness of many young parents.

More info: 
https://www.red-dot.org/project/philips-avent-night-owl-55528
https://www.philips.com/a-w/about/news/archive/standard/news/articles/2022/20220406-philips-receives-three-red-dot-design-best-of-the-best-ratings-for-ground-breaking-design-excellence.html

awards.title: Red Dot Brands & Communication Design Award (Red Dot Winner 2019) - Philips SleepMapper app
awards.description:
Philips received a Red Dot Brands & Communication Design Award for the Philips SleepMapper app.
The app combines with Philips’ SmartSleep portfolio of consumer sleep solutions such as Philips’ SmartSleep wearable sleep headband, which is clinically proven to improve the quality of your sleep. The app tracks sleep patterns over time, measures key metrics and shows the slow wave boost the users gets from SmartSleep each night.

More info:
https://www.red-dot.org/project/philips-sleepmapper-41212
https://www.philips.com/a-w/about/news/archive/standard/news/articles/2019/20190819-philips-receives-the-red-dot-design-award-best-of-the-best-as-a-brand.html

awards.title: IF Design Award 2018 - Somneo Sleep and Wake Up Light
awards.description:
Somneo helps users relax before falling asleep and wake up naturally refreshed, improving quality of life. Its poetic design language is fitting for a bedroom. Gradual illumination of the light ring and the 3D curve enhances the wake-up experience by giving the light more depth. A touch-sensitive user interface/display disappears during the night and uses proximity sensing to light up when needed. A simple tap turns on the night light. The molded body integrates the split lines around the front ring and back speaker into the design, while the surfacing allows the light to flow perfectly.

More info: https://ifworlddesignguide.com/entry/230001-somneo

awards.title: CES 2018 Innovation Award Honoree: Tech for a better World - uGrow Digital Parenting Platform
awards.description:
CES 2018 Innovation Awards
The CES Innovation Awards is an annual competition honoring outstanding design and engineering in consumer technology products.

Philips Avent uGrow digital parenting platform with American Well virtual care services: uGrow is designed to support parents and their baby’s healthy development with actionable insights. Coming soon to uGrow’s ecosystem of connected devices are Amazon Echo voice activation and the Philips Avent smart feeding kit that will automatically monitor the time, volume and duration of a baby’s feeds. The recently announced strategic partnership between Philips and American Well will embed telehealth services into uGrow. It means that the personalized advice provided by uGrow will include the option of a secure video call to a healthcare professional (children’s medical or adult medical physician), 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and the service helps with scheduling a virtual consult with a lactation consultant or mental health specialist. uGrow has been named a CES 2018 Innovation Awards Honoree in the ‘Tech For A Better World’ product category.

https://www.ces.tech/Events-Programs/Innovation-Awards/honorees#inline_content11455

awards.title: CES 2017 Innovation Award Honoree
awards.description:
The Philips Avent uGrow digital parenting platform is the world’s first medical baby app with connected devices, providing personal advice that matters and is built onto the Philips Health Suite digital platform (HSDP) for complete security and privacy.

http://www.ces.tech/Events-Programs/Innovation-Awards/honorees/InnovationAwards/2017/Tech-For-A-Better-World/Philips-Avent-uGrow-Digital-Parenting-Platform.aspx

profile_positions.description:
As the Global Digital Product Manager for Philips' Consumer Sleep and Mother & Child Care Business Group, I create and launch innovative digital solutions that enhance people's lives. Working closely with R&D, marketing, and market representatives, I oversee the entire product lifecycle, from concept to end-of-life, ensuring that each product meets user specifications and market demands. With expertise in market segmentation, competitive strategy, and agile development, I manage the development and implementation of digital IoT platforms, connected devices, and services.

My key tasks include:

- Leading Philips' digital connected SmartSleep and BabyTech platforms; 3 apps and 7 connected health-tech devices, available in 50+ markets with over 600K+ downloads.
- Defining and driving the digital roadmap strategy with a wide variety of 50+ stakeholders and multiple development teams across the globe, including the US, NL, India, and Hong Kong.
- Continuously improving the app experience and growing the digital platform based on OKRs, customer feedback, data analytics, and technological advancements.

For more information, visit Philips.com/smartsleep (SleepMapper app) and Philips.com/Avent (Philips Avent Baby Monitor+ app). As a seasoned digital product manager with a strong background in marketing and an affinity for health-tech solutions, I am committed to creating profitable products that positively impact people's lives.
profile_positions.title: Senior Digital Global Product Manager - Consumer Sleep & BabyTech @ Philips

profile_positions.location: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States & Amsterdam, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
The Global Product Manager is the pivotal marketing role in the Sleep Business Group (BG) and drives creation of solutions (integrated combination of products, apps and services) from idea to market. For more info visit philips.com/smartsleep

I’m accountable for defining, launching and building profitable products, solutions and platforms that improve people’s lives. I work directly with R&D, other marketing functions and end markets to ensure the products, solutions & apps are developed to the feature and user specifications that each target market segment demands. As Global Product Manager I’m responsible for the product lifecycle from concept phase through development, launch and eventually, end of life. I have deep expertise in market segmentation, product strategy, competitive strategy, product management and agile development. I’m responsible for development and management of digital platform solutions as well as devices and services. I demonstrate experience in marketing digital propositions and affinity with digital platform-based trends and solutions in the health-tech domain.

Key tasks:
- E2E responsible as Digital Product Manager for Philips' first, award winning, digital consumer sleep platform with 3 connected SmartSleep IoT solutions and AI-driven sleep recommendations, available in 23 markets and 210K+ downloads.
- Define and drive digital roadmap strategy with wide variety of stakeholders and multiple development teams across the globe (US, NL, India).
- Managing 3 scrum agile teams and 2 product owners for app development and growth 
- Constantly improve app experience and grow digital platform based on OKRs, customer feedback, data analytics and technological advancements.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Global Product Manager Digital - Healthy Sleep Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Philips Avent is committed to supporting parents and their babies, giving them the best start in life to set the stage for healthier futures. As the heart of their strategy is the uGrow platform, a parenting platform to support new parents with personalized content and guidance based on their child's individual needs. This is distilled from the data which they capture through their portfolio of connected devices and manual trackers.

As Digital Consumer Marketing Manager (Product Manager) I'm responsible for the definition of propositions from strong consumer insights to the launch and execution in the market.

Key tasks:
- As "Product Manager" (in Agile/SAFE terms) hence fully responsible for defining and launching the MVP, and subsequently managing the digital proposition in-market with 400K+ downloads in 12 markets.
- Partner up with a large number of stakeholders across the globe and multiple scrum teams in order to execute the development roadmap.
- Demonstrate a combined expertise of digital consumer insights & trends and technology affinity. 
- Challenge digital propositions and support others in the digital transformation process
- E2E responsible for 3th party product and service integrations (American Well telehealth, Amazon Alexa, Voice Assistant).
- Demonstrate Product solution at key customer and market events (IFA, CES, K&J)
profile_positions.title: Product Manager (Digital Consumer Marketing Manager) - Mother & Child Care
